TextAsset.value: Yes it is, Meowkie. Because the truth is... I like you.
Well... maybe... Only if you want it to be.
Spending time with someone so good could never be a waste.
Meowkie, I don’t understand why you say these things!
(The rest of detention passed pretty quickly…
I was barely paying attention at all.
How could I, knowing I would be here at the cafe soon, on a date with Meowkie?
...It IS a real date, right?
Well, either way, we should talk...
It’s now or never, I guess.)
Hey look Boss! They have the seafood special today!
Yeah! And look...
It says it comes half price...
If you order it on a date.
The “Lovebird Discount.”
So Boss...
This is really... a real date?
That’s nice of you to say...
Heh, Boss. It’s sweet of you... the lengths you’ll go to cheer me up.
I really mean it though!
(Somehow, I get the sense that she doesn’t quite believe me...
But why not? I didn’t really think about it until tonight, but…
I know how I feel when I look at her.
Meowkie...)
Uh... you don’t have to say anything if you don’t want to.
(It seems like she wants to say something, but she’s holding back.
Meowkie... I wish you’d tell me what you’re thinking!)
Good evening! And what will we be having tonight?
O-oh... we’re sharing the seafood special, I guess?
Good choice.
...So, Boss...
Yes?
That rolling up stuff you like to do... is it fun?
Oh! Yeah, I guess so...
It’s kinda why I got into trouble in the first place though.
Why do you ask?
I just figured... I should look at this as an opportunity!
Now that I ain’t a Hall Monitor no more, I got time for other hobbies.
Rolling up stuff like you do... It might be fun! Maybe you could teach me sometime.
But Meowkie... you love being a Hall Monitor!
Yeah, b-but...
No use crying over spilled milk! Eh, Boss?
Look... I know you think I oughta be, um, angry.
And I know those other kids get me in trouble on purpose.
I’m not stupid!
I know what they think of me.
They think I’m bad and I deserve to go to detention anyway.
So why don’t you ever speak up? Doesn’t it make you angry?
I’m not angry at them!
I’m not!
Stop asking me that!
But... but why not?
I’d be angry if I were you!
Because... because...
Because I just can’t do it, okay?
Meowkie...
Boss... I mean, ${slot:playerName}.
Being angry is... bad.
You yell, and you argue...
You forget to be nice.
My parents sent me here...
So I could grow up to be good.
If I get angry...
If I stop being nice and good...
Then everything they did was for nothing!
That’s why I can’t get angry...
besides...
It’ll just prove... that everyone was right about me after all.
But... what do you do, then?
You can’t be happy ALL the time, if people treat you so badly...
Maybe...
Maybe they’re right to treat me that way...
What?!
How could you say that?!
N-nevermind... haha, it’s pretty silly of me.
Just forget it.
Anyway... even if what you’re saying is true...
It doesn’t matter, because I don’t get angry at all!
Sorry! Heh!
But... you can’t just not get angry.
It’s impossible.
Any more than you can stop yourself from laughing at something really funny.
Or...
Or from having a crush on someone...
Who you really, really like.
Gee, Boss... I’m sorry I’m being such a downer! Heh!
(Ignoring what I said about the crush, huh...)
That’s probably why... it’s good I’m not a Hall Monitor anymore.
A great Monitor never lets her personal problems get in the way of her confidence and focus!
Meowkie... just pretending to be happy all the time...
That isn’t an answer.
Here’s your seafood special, lovebirds.
(Yikes. Bad timing.)
Uh, thank you sir.
Uh... Hey Meowkie, look.
There’s tons of tuna in here!
You love that stuff.
Thank you Boss... I mean ${slot:playerName}.
Thank you for taking me on a nice date.
Whoah, why are you standing up all of a sudden?
Meowkie...
It was really, um, really nice of you.
I’ve had a great time hanging out with you...
The best time I’ve had since I came to this school.
If that’s, um... okay to say.
But... I think I really should be going now...
It’s not your fault...
It’s mine, like it always is.
So, goodbye, um, I guess.
Meowkie, wait-
It’s okay if you don’t want to hang out anymore...
I completely understand...
if you don’t want to waste your time on... someone like me.
Nyaa... Boss, you’re so nice.
Trying so hard to cheer me up...
No matter who I really am.
You know...
You’d make a great Hall Monitor, if you wanted to do it.
I’m sorry…
I gotta go.
How’s that lovebird special coming-
Oh, it’s just you.
What happened to your date?
She, um…
She just left.
YIKES. That’s rough.
Tell you what- it’s on the house.
(...Small comfort.
I can’t believe she left before I could even say another word.
Sigh...
I don’t care what she says.
If she left without eating a single bite of all this tuna...
She’s gotta be feeling really angry.)
...I can help you finish that.
Oh, hi, Pac-Man.
I’m glad you’re here...
I really need someone to talk to.
I had a date, but...
It really didn’t go well.
I was just thinking...
I know Meowkie gets angry just like the rest of us.
And if the other students are so awful to her all the time...
Then she must be angry inside all the time.
But...
if she thinks being angry really is bad...
Then she must think that the other students are right.
She must think she really is bad on the inside.
When she got that Hall Monitor badge, she must have felt like it was proof.
Proof that she was good.
But without it, there’s nothing to stop her from thinking she’s bad...
Meowkie... she shouldn’t need that badge to feel good.
She is good! No matter what!
She’s the nicest, strongest person I know! She really cares, and she tries her hardest all the time! No matter what!
(Chew, chew…)
There’s only one thing to do in a situation like this, ${slot:playerName}…
(Chew, chew…)
Be chew to yourself.
I MEAN, true to yourself.
Be true to yourself.
… Yeah...
Yeah, you’re right.
If I can be true to myself and my feelings...
Maybe she can be true to her feelings too.
This is really good tuna.
